texts.orig: If you find yourself in the sticky situation where
texts.text: If you find yourself in the sticky situation where

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: still won't kill a sendmail process, check the process list. If
texts.text: still won't kill a sendmail process, check the process list. If

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: returns a "D" status code, you won't be able to stop the process. It's in an "uninterruptable sleep" state which cannot be killed.
texts.text: returns a "D" status code, you won't be able to stop the process. It's in an "uninterruptable sleep" state which cannot be killed.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: What can you do to fix this? Check for file locking. Are files in the mail queue directory locked? Are the files in the mail queue mounted over NFS (by an idiotic administrator)? If so, the only fix is to set sendmail to not start on reboot, then reboot the box.
texts.text: What can you do to fix this? Check for file locking. Are files in the mail queue directory locked? Are the files in the mail queue mounted over NFS (by an idiotic administrator)? If so, the only fix is to set sendmail to not start on reboot, then reboot the box.
